explanation: [0-0] A rectangular yellow wood block is placed on a yellow table with a wood grain pattern. The block has a recessed flat surface on top. Wood shavings are scattered around it, and the background is white. There is a black object on the right.
[0-4] Then a right hand holding a white marker writes "2022" in black on the recessed area of the wood block.
